data.message: Eminem I used to be your biggest fan since that BET Cypher I see you as a sell-out use Black Entertainment to trash the president of the United States when you could have just went on YouTube to do it

this is only the problem if Trump WASN'T establishment and actually was always a good candidate to begin with. This has never been the case lol

They spit too, it was a cypher, theirs just didn't go viral like em' s verse. By the way he would get paid to just have it on youtube, once you have so many views YouTube runs ads on your video and you get paid.

BET was put there because MTV wouldn't put black performers on their Network. Not even Michael Jackson. Eventually it changed but only because MTV never would have survived without it. He was right where he needed to be.
